position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 44630075, 'name': 'Social Finance Matters', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFEousp9SIBGQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1568568762939?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=fQDPwB0tShQW_DS02qD1D7l2vlIxsgpXenB3vyqolmg', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/social-finance-matters/', 'employees': {'start': 0, 'end': 1}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Social Finance Matters', 'description': "The mission of Social Finance Matters is to strengthen the support infrastructure for mission-driven and impact-driven enterprises and innovation. My activities cover the broad field of entrepreneurship, investing and financial strategies (in particular: impact investing, venture philanthropy, and grantmaking and subsidies), creative industries, and mission-driven innovation. My focus is on five fields in particular: 

(1) Open and accessible financing and support instruments. 
(2) Innovative support arrangements for impact-driven entrepreneurship
(3) Effective support for both entrepreneurs and investors/donors 
(4) Education and skills (special focus on young/student entrepreneurship)
(5) System change for an impact-driven, post-growth economy. Democratizing community investment

Examples of projects and activities:
* Developing a broad national programme for living labs and fieldlabs, CLICKNL, Dutch national innovation policy. 
* Mentor for start-ups in sustainable urban tourism under the EU-funded TOURBAN programme. 
* Member of the Labs & Lab Development Core Team at Inholland University.
* Analysis and advice for Stimuleringsfonds Creatieve Industrie (Fund for the creative industries).
* Advice and mentoring for the European Commission's Employment and Social Innovation (EaSI) Programme.
* Advice for the European Social Innovation Competition.
* Getting started with participatory grantmaking. 
* Innovation grants for social projects. Comparative research and community of practice / Dutch municipalities and provinces.
* Urban living labs Inholland University. Setting up new living labs for Inholland's creative business department in Amsterdam, The Hague, Rotterdam, and Haarlem.
* Crash Course Community Finance. Full-day course for non-financial professionals.

Visit https://socialfinancematters.nl for an overview of my services, courses, and publications. Feel free to sign up for my monthly newsletter.

Links to projects/organizations I work with:", 'title': 'Founder | Impact and innovation entrepreneur', 'employment_type': 'Self-employed'}]}, {'company': {'id': 34629321, 'name': 'Stadmakersfonds', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGdVwfu59WU-g/company-logo_400_400/0/1604921839036?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=rPvCJJLqSogn_EqYvhXRWdp6CA8tF6WUz-q9BO0IYN8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/stadmakersfonds/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Utrecht, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Stadmakersfonds', 'description': "Ambassador of Stadmakersfonds (Dutch City Makers Fund). The City Makers Fund was founded in 2019 and contributes to lively and inclusive cities by investing in initiatives that add social value to urban environments. The fund calls these initiators 'city makers'. In addition to generating social impact, investees must also generate a reasonable economic return. The City Makers Funds started in Utrecht and has a relentless ambition to scale up to other Dutch cities and regions. https://stadmakersfonds.nl/", 'title': 'Ambassador', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 73865715, 'name': 'Juttersgeluk', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQG1uU9mbHZung/company-logo_400_400/0/1620661938097?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=obY7AosEWPGP2GFtHX9yd4xYhbwN_8Bi82ayqzcm-Bw', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/juttersgeluk/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Overveen', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Juttersgeluk', 'description': '(English below) 

Juttersgeluk is een sociale onderneming met upcycle atelier die mensen, die (tijdelijk) minder goed meekomen in de maatschappij, wil betrekken bij een schoner strand met verschillende activiteiten. Zo krijgen zij de kans een positieve bijdrage te leveren aan een duurzaam leefmilieu voor zichzelf en voor anderen in het kustgebied van Nederland. Meedoen, op welke wijze dan ook, is daarbij het belangrijkst. Plastic afval van het strand wordt verwerkt en krijgt een nieuw leven in een verrassende, creatieve producten met een verhaal.

Juttersgeluk is a social enterprise and upcycle studio in Overveen, close to the Dutch coast near Amsterdam. Juttersgeluk offers (temporarily) disadvantaged people a unique opportunity to contribute to a more sustainable coastal environment for themselves and for others. Plastic waste found at the beaches is being processed and gets a new life as surprising, creative products with a story.', 'title': 'Chairman Of The Board / Bestuursvoorzitter', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 5012450, 'name': 'Voor je Buurt', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQF1XNkbPsu7NQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519881552145?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=F5OrWY1MsAXlnvTtIZnfo0SG6latGRoAavTBWMzVqxs', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/voor-je-buurt/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Voor je Buurt', 'description': 'Voor je Buurt is a civic engagement innovator and runs the largest civic crowdfunding platform in the Netherlands. It is a leading voice in (international) debates about new ways to fund and realize civic projects, to engage the crowd and to strengthen bottom-up innovation for complex social problems. We work together with governments, trusts and companies to create strong support infrastructures for civic initiatives. volunteer_experiences: [{'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'role': 'Lid Raad van Inspiratie', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Stichting Juttersgeluk', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': 'CIVIL_RIGHTS', 'description': 'Juttersgeluk is een upcycle atelier voor plastic van de Nederlandse stranden. Strandjutten is een mooie manier om samen aan een duurzame toekomst te werken.
